items.sentence: Tom mistakenly got on the bus headed for Boston.
I really don\'t know what you\'re talking about.
That was the first time I had ever driven a car.
The wind was so strong that the windows rattled.
Tom and Mary are watching TV in the living room.
How are we going to find someone to replace Tom?
How come you never told me you were from Boston?
How did you find out that Tom wanted to do that?
How did you learn that Tom was living in Boston?
I\'ll tell you when I find out what\'s going on.
